name: Run for life (Paul)
description:
Hi, my name is Paul. I am from the Czech Republic and I started developing games on the 2nd of June when I graduated from high school.

So far I have created 3 games and it was fun developing them.

I will be glad if you write me your opinion, what I could improve, what I could do differently, etc...

And by the way, sorry for my English, I tried my best

Assets are from:

  • Music
    • Tallbeard Studios
  • Sound effects
    • Kenney
  • Tilemap
    • Kenney
  • Fonts
    • ANDYB
    • FredokaOne-Regular
    • PressStart2P-Regular
